title: Drawing, "Sketch for "Gang's All Here," Act I", 1931
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on cream tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower left: HENRY DREYFUSS - DESIGNER / 580-5TH AVENUE, NEW YORK / TEL. BRYANT 8638 / stamp in black ink, lower right, of Scenic Artists Union Local 829.
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, upper right: Note: / If any question / please phone!; lower margin: Addition to drop / "Gang's All Here" Act. I
creditline: Gift of University of California, Los Angeles
description: Sketch of a colorful toy dog holding a container in its mouth, and partial giraffe in graphite.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketch for "Gang's All Here," Act I", 1931.
1931. Brush and gouache, graphite on cream tracing paper. Gift of University of California, Los Angeles. 1973-15-134.
